QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Abdominal girth
QAPair.Answer: Abdominal girth is the measurement of the distance around the abdomen at a specific point. Measurement is most often made at the level of the belly button (navel). Abdominal girth is used to diagnose and monitor the following: Buildup of fluid in the abdomen, most often caused by liver failure , heart failure , or any cancer that has spread widely throughout the abdomen, Obesity, Buildup of intestinal gas, most often caused by blockage or obstruction in the intestines ,
